headline: Figma aims to raise up to $1.03 billion in NYSE IPO
summary: Investing.com -- Cloud-based designer platform Figma announced Monday it is targeting to raise up to $1.03 billion in its initial public offering (IPO) in the United States.

raw.headline: Figma aims to raise up to $1.03 billion in NYSE IPO
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Cloud-based designer platform Figma announced Monday it is targeting to raise up to $1.03 billion in its initial public offering (IPO) in the United States.

headline: Figma aims at $16.4 billion valuation as tech IPOs bounce back
summary: (Reuters) -Figma is targeting a fully-diluted valuation of up to $16.4 billion in its initial public offering, as the cloud-based design software firm prepares for a debut on the NYSE that could inject fresh momentum into a resurgent market for tech listings.  The listing could be a major milestone for Figma, coming more than a year after its $20 billion sale to Adobe failed due to regulatory hurdles in Europe and the UK.  An equities rally and a bunch of strong debuts recently have helped remove the IPO market overhang.
